column4: Since I've upgraded to karmic, my opengl performance has been terrible
I'm using the Nvidia closed source drivers
Quake Wars is all laggy now, where it wasn't before karmic
I have a fairly decent machine, quad core, 8 gigs of ram, GTX 280
are you sure you are actually using that driver? i'd run a lsmod | grep nv and see if nvidia is returned and not nv
it should be able to handle quake wars on medium settings, yet Karmic stutters and lags badly
No, I"m sure i"m using the official one
I do opengl development
and nv has no hardware 3d support
lsmod | grep nvidia
but for the hell of it ;)
I know nv has no 3d accel hence my question, I would suggest filing a bug
okay thanks, I was curious if it was a well known issue or not
typically if a quick google doesn't return anything and you know what you are doing you are probably stuck with a new issue :(
yeah I was just making sure
do other opengl apps run fine?
that google wasn't missing
generally they work okay, it's more obvious when you're really taxing the hardware
this is also an upgrade and not a clean install
I was also thinking it could be a kernel/driver issue
I may try the nvidia beta drivers and see if it helps

technically doing an upgrade that shouldn't matter but if you are getting hardware accel in other apps and just not this one (There are other games you could try that 'tax' the hardware) then it may be a bug, any weird output when you start it?
